content.description: Start matched on an edge way back in the roof with a rock at your back and probably a heal hook.  Gain the lip, get out of the roof, commit to a slick mantle and ride the tall, but easy slab to the top.
content.protection: A few pads and a good spotter.  Falling on the mantle or slab is precarious.
content.location: Just above Leroy, visible from the trail, just before Obzen/Decadence boulder.

content.description:
Follow the horizontal crack out from under the roof then straight up useing both aretes and the face 

  On the same boulder as the CCC trail project
content.location: Hike up CCC trail and once you pass the lower switch-backs keep an eye out on your right. If you reach the Little Flatiron you've gone too far.

content.description: Fun and just next to the trail.. Start sitting with a left slopey sidepull and a right sidepull with a thumb catch.  Gain a crimp, a sloper, press it out and finish.  Kind of a little gem.Also a V1 version stands with right hand out on the arete and left squeezing.
content.location: Just next to the trail on the right if going up just before you reach the first cliff band.  Just before and next to Obzen/Decadence boulder.

content.description: Excellent line up the CCC Trail Project boulder! Begin under the roof with a left hand slot crimp and a right hand block. Establish and climb out of the roof onto the textured vertical face avoiding the detached block under the roof. Great movement up a proud boulder!
content.location: On the CCC Trail Project boulder. Walk up the CCC Trail and once you pass the lower switch-backs keep an eye out on your right.  If you reach the Little Flatiron you've gone too far.

content.description: A fun little boulder!  Start matched on a sloper dish on the left side of the arete.  Climb right along the arete, wrap the corner and finish it up.  It’s possible to exit the feature earlier but dabby and a bit easier. Ride it out for a complete life experience, ya know.
content.protection: A few pads, perhaps a spot.
content.location: Just above the prominent CCC project boulder that is below the first cliff you walk underneath walking up the CCC trail.  In other terms..  At the base of the route Mongo Fury..  or at the base of the cliff the problem Rail Gun sits on top of.  Very accessible.

content.description: A massive boulder with a massive overhang.
